sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; const examSchedule = [ { time: '09:00 AM', date: '2024-03-15', group: 'Group A', subject: 'Mathematics', type: 'Regular', room: 'Room 101' }, { time: '11:30 AM', date: '2024-03-15', group: 'Group B', subject: 'Physics', type: 'Regular', room: 'Room 102' }, { time: '02:00 PM', date: '2024-03-15', group: 'Group C', subject: 'Chemistry', type: 'Supply', room: 'Room 103' }, { time: '09:00 AM', date: '2024-03-16', group: 'Group A', subject: 'Computer Science', type: 'Regular', room: 'Room 104' }, { time: '11:30 AM', date: '2024-03-16', group: 'Group B', subject: 'English', type: 'Regular', room: 'Room 105' }, { time: '02:00 PM', date: '2024-03-16', group: 'Group C', subject: 'Mathematics', type: 'Supply', room: 'Room 101' }, { time: '09:00 AM', date: '2024-03-17', group: 'Group A', subject: 'Physics Lab', type: 'Regular', room: 'Lab 1' }, { time: '11:30 AM', date: '2024-03-17', group: 'Group B', subject: 'Chemistry Lab', type: 'Regular', room: 'Lab 2' } ]; export default function HeroSection() { const [currentExamIndex, setCurrentExamIndex] = useState(0); useEffect(() => { const interval = setInterval(() => { setCurrentExamIndex((prev) => (prev + 1) % examSchedule.length); }, 3000); // Change every 3 seconds return () => clearInterval(interval); }, []); const formatDate = (dateString) => { const date = new Date(dateString); return date.toLocaleDateString('en-US', { weekday: 'short', month: 'short', day: 'numeric' }); }; const currentExam = examSchedule[currentExamIndex]; return (

Exam Timetable

Important exam schedules and updates

{currentExam.type} {currentExam.room}
{currentExam.subject}
{currentExam.time}
{formatDate(currentExam.date)}
{currentExam.group}

Upcoming Exams

{examSchedule.slice(0, 3).map((exam, index) => (
{exam.time}
{exam.subject}
{exam.group}
{exam.type}
))}
{examSchedule.length}
Total Exams
5
Regular Exams
3
Supply Exams
); }
